figure.head: Box
figure.figDesc:
Recent policy initiatives that will promote entrepreneurship
As part of the 2007 Budget, the new government has introduced a number of policy initiatives aimed at
improving the conditions for entrepreneurship:
â€¢ The wealth tax will be halved from 1.5% to 0.75% as a prelude to abolishing it later in this electoral period.
